body_html:
I know the reason why the debug build runs into the 65535 symbol linker limit:
The debug build does not expand inlines. The fix is to change it CMakeLists.txt:
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "/D_DEBUG /MDd /Ob0")
to
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "/D_DEBUG /MDd /Ob2")

I'll send a PR for this.

I'll send a PR for this.
body:
I know the reason  why the debug build runs into the 65535 symbol linker limit:
The debug build does not expand inlines. The fix is to change it CMakeLists.txt:
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "/D_DEBUG /MDd /Ob0")
to
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "/D_DEBUG /MDd /Ob2")

I'll send a PR for this.
